docs.lead_paragraph: New images from the Hubble Space Telescope have been released of the supernova called SN1987A, first detected in February 1987.

headline.print_headline: First Seen 30 Years Ago, a Supernova Refuses to Be Ignored
headline.main: First Seen 30 Years Ago, a Supernova Refuses to Be Ignored

docs.snippet: New images from the Hubble Space Telescope have been released of the supernova called SN1987A, first detected in February 1987....

docs.lead_paragraph: Jihadists on motorbikes killed two people including a school official early Friday in a village in Burkina Faso's north and then went to other villages demanding that schools close, a provincial official said.

headline.print_headline: Extremists Kill 2 in Burkina Faso as Schools Targeted
headline.main: Extremists Kill 2 in Burkina Faso as Schools Targeted

docs.snippet: Jihadists on motorbikes killed two people including a school official early Friday in a village in Burkina Faso's north and then went to other villages demanding that schools close, a provincial official said....

docs.lead_paragraph: Norway extended their dominance at the Nordic World Ski Championships on Friday when they held off a strong challenge from Russia to sweep to victory in the men's 4 x 10 km relay and claim their sixth gold medal in Lahti.

headline.print_headline: Nordic Skiing: Norway Take Gold, Hosts Finland Miss Out on Bronze in Men's 10 Km Relay
headline.main: Nordic Skiing: Norway Take Gold, Hosts Finland Miss Out on Bronze in Men's 10 Km Relay

docs.snippet: Norway extended their dominance at the Nordic World Ski Championships on Friday when they held off a strong challenge from Russia to sweep to victory in the men's 4 x 10 km relay and claim their sixth gold medal in Lahti....

docs.lead_paragraph: A U.N. human rights expert voiced alarm on Friday that U.S. President Donald Trump might allow torture in interrogations, warning that it "lays down the gauntlet" for other countries to follow suit.

headline.print_headline: Trump Torture Remarks 'Lay Down Gauntlet' for Other States: U.N. Expert
headline.main: Trump Torture Remarks 'Lay Down Gauntlet' for Other States: U.N. Expert

docs.lead_paragraph: Baylor women's basketball coach Kim Mulkey made a tearful apology for her recent controversial remarks about the school's sexual assault scandal.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mercedes is recalling about 1 million cars and SUVs worldwide because a starter part can overheat and cause fires.

headline.main: Mercedes Recalls 1M Vehicles Worldwide Due to Fire Risk

docs.lead_paragraph: Canada's Hudson's Bay Co, owner of the Lord & Taylor and Saks Fifth Avenue retail chains, has yet to line up equity financing for a bid for Macy's Inc, over a month after approaching its U.S. peer, people familiar with the matter said.

headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Lord & Taylor Owner Hudson's Bay's Bid for Macy's Stumbles-Sources
headline.main: Exclusive: Lord & Taylor Owner Hudson's Bay's Bid for Macy's Stumbles-Sources

docs.snippet: Canada's Hudson's Bay Co, owner of the Lord & Taylor and Saks Fifth Avenue retail chains, has yet to line up equity financing for a bid for Macy's Inc, over a month after approaching its U.S. peer, people familiar with the matter said....

docs.lead_paragraph: The remains of babies, ranging from new-born to three-years-old, have been found in the sewers of a former Church-run home for unmarried mothers in Ireland, the government said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Baby Remains Found at Former Church-Run Home for Unmarried Mothers
headline.main: Baby Remains Found at Former Church-Run Home for Unmarried Mothers
